dmca.title: [EV1-C1284997H] Notice of Abuse and Request to Cease and Desists
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Monday, October 09, 2006 12:24 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1284997H] Notice of Abuse and Request to Cease and Desists Subject: [EV1-C1284997H] Notice of Abuse and Request to Cease and Desists ==== Original Message ==== 1. Notice of Abuse and Request to Cease and Desists Added by system at Monday, Oct 9 2006 04:24 pm X-MailFrom: mark@jigsaw.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Oct 9 17:21:56 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 9 Oct 2006 17:21:23 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 09 Oct 2006 17:21:23 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from mark@jigsaw.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GX3Ux-0000Br-MJ; Mon, 09 Oct 2006 17:21:23 -0500 Received: from sitemail2.everyone.net ([216.200.145.36] helo=omta18.mta.everyone.net) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from mark@jigsaw.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GX3Uu-0001M7-Rj; Mon, 09 Oct 2006 17:21:21 -0500 Received: from dm16.mta.everyone.net (bigiplb-dsnat [172.16.0.19]) by omta18.mta.everyone.net (Postfix) with ESMTP id 1616540EE7; Mon, 9 Oct 2006 15:21:18 -0700 (PDT) X-Eon-Dm: dm16 Received: by dm16.mta.everyone.net (EON-AUTHRELAY2 - 3f52026a) id dm16.45233081.1684db; Mon, 9 Oct 2006 15:21:18 -0700 X-Eon-Sig: AQHvTMtFKsteouhTRAIAAAAC,bad4a09f6b3f543285ed5d3143148461 From: "Mark Palmer" To: Cc: Subject: Notice of Abuse and Request to Cease and Desists Date: Mon, 9 Oct 2006 15:21:09 -0700 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_009F_01C6EBB6.8C9618A0" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 Thread-Index: Acbr8TbY+cj3FHHBRI2g7kNCQ4aCYw== Message-Id: <20061009152118.1174D0D5@dm16.mta.everyone.net> Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 216.200.145.36 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of jigsaw.com) client-ip=216.200.145.36; envelope-from=mark@jigsaw.com; helo=omta18.mta.everyone.net; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 09 Oct 2006 22:21:23.0606 (UTC) FILETIME=[40F4AB60:01C6EBF1] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear The Planet.com: Please accept this as notice of abuse by the website that The Planet.com hosts at jigsawdatacorporation.biz (67.18.160.230). The jigsawdatacorporation.biz domain is owned by Archit Infotech, out of Mumbai, India, whose actions, in association with those of SMS Media Pvt. Ltd., are in violation of numerous intellectual property laws, unfair trade practice regulations and miscellaneous other state and Federal statutes. Further, any implication of a relationship between SMS Media and Jigsaw Data Company is fraudulent and deceitful. Jigsaw Data Corporation, a Delaware corporation, legitimately owes operates a data company with an online marketplace at www.jigsaw.com . In order to prevent a continuing fraud and to avoid other unnecessary damages, we respectfully request the following: 1. That The Planet immediately cease hosting jigsawdatacorporation.biz pending your investigation; 2. That The Planet collect and retain any and all information, records and evidence in its possession custody or control with respect to the hosting of jigsawdatacorporation.biz at 67.18.160.230. 3. That The Planet (i) immediately state its policy and procedures under which Jigsaw may request the information listed in (2.) above, and (ii) if The Planet requires a subpoena or other court order for such information, provide a timely response indicating the proper agent and address for service of process and whether The Planet is will accept service of our legal complaint as necessary to obtain such an order. Please advise me of you intentions with respect to this matter at you earliest convenience. I look forward to hearing from you. Thank you in advance for your cooperation. Mark S. Palmer Corporate Counsel and Director of Privacy Jigsaw Data Corporation 1700 S. Amphlett Blvd., Suite 250 San Mateo, CA 94402 mark@jigsaw.com Tel: 650.655.2267 Fax: 650.655.2222 www.jigsaw.com MIME element (text/html)

Dear The Planet.com:

 

Please accept this as notice of abuse by the website that The Planet.com hosts at jigsawdatacorporation.biz (67.18.160.230).

 

The jigsawdatacorporation.biz domain is owned by Archit Infotech, out of Mumbai, India, whose actions, in association with those of SMS Media Pvt. Ltd., are in violation of numerous intellectual property laws, unfair trade practice regulations and miscellaneous other state and Federal statutes.  Further, any implication of a relationship between SMS Media and Jigsaw Data Company is fraudulent and deceitful.   

 

Jigsaw Data Corporation, a Delaware corporation, legitimately owes operates a data company with an online marketplace at www.jigsaw.com.   In order to prevent a continuing fraud and to avoid other unnecessary damages, we respectfully request the following:

 

1.       That The Planet immediately cease hosting jigsawdatacorporation.biz pending your investigation;

2.       That The Planet collect and retain any and all information, records and evidence in its possession custody or control with respect to the hosting of jigsawdatacorporation.biz at 67.18.160.230.

3.       That The Planet (i) immediately state its policy and procedures under which Jigsaw may request the information listed in (2.) above, and (ii) if The Planet requires a subpoena or other court order for such information, provide a timely response indicating the proper agent and address for service of process and whether The Planet is will accept service of our legal complaint as necessary to obtain such an order.

 

Please advise me of you intentions with respect to this matter at you earliest convenience.  I look forward to hearing from you.  Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

 

Mark S. Palmer

Corporate Counsel and Director of Privacy

Jigsaw Data Corporation

1700 S. Amphlett Blvd., Suite 250

San Mateo, CA 94402

mark@jigsaw.com

Tel: 650.655.2267

Fax: 650.655.2222

www.jigsaw.com

 

MIME element (text/plain)
